Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.InterfaceDAOs

Interface ICategoryDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockCategoryDAO, SqliteCategoryDAO
public interface ICategoryDAO
CRUD interface for interacting with Category in a database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    Adds a new category to the DAO.

  • Method Details

    • addCategory

      int addCategory(Category category)
      Adds a new category to the DAO. The ID should be set by the database.
      Parameters:
      category - The category that should be added to the database.

    • updateCategory

      void updateCategory(Category category)
      Call this for updating an already existing category in the database. Category should be chosen by the ID.
      Parameters:
      category - The category that should be updated.

    • deleteCategory

      void deleteCategory(Category category)
      Deletes a category in the database. The category to be deleted should be chosen by its ID.
      Parameters:
      category - The category to be deleted. The ID value should be set.

    • getAllCategories

      List<Category> getAllCategories()
      Method to get all categories in a database.
      Returns:
      A list of all categories.

    • getCategoryInGroupByName

      Category getCategoryInGroupByName(String categoryName, int groupID)

    • getCategoriesByGroupID

      List<Category> getCategoriesByGroupID(int groupID)
